pages.text: The Artifact Quiver cannot be equipped in the Trinket Slot, instead you need to hold it at $(c) Deputy $() to use it. When the right button (or shift+ right button) is used, it will go into cooldown. During the cooldown period, all the arrows you shoot will have a corresponding effect.
Arrows shot have a penetrating effect
Arrows fired have a lightning effect
Arrows are fired with a flame effect
Arrows can travel faster through the water
